The Purchaser agrees to give the Vendor as partial payment and as a deposit the vehicle described above as the "trade-in vehicle." The Purchaser declares that the vehicle is conform to its description that it is not subject to any tariff pursuant to the Customs Act and that it has no defect, hidden or apparent, except those described in the evaluation report and in the written declaration attached here to if such is the case. The Purchaser declares being the sole and absolute owner of the trade-in vehicle which is not subject to any restrictions in regards to its registration, and that it is free of any lien, charge, rightof retention or other priority, as well as any other right, except for declared provisions.
